title: ILE Blackout Patchwork Laptop Bag
content:
A study in materials, textures, and composition, ILE’s Blackout Patchwork collection features tonal renditions of ILE shop favorites. The brand’s latest bag is a Laptop Bag…

Blackout Patchwork pieces are made using panels of four hard-wearing, weatherproof fabrics: VX21 XPAC, X50 XPAC, 500D Cordura / 275 Dyneema Ripstop, and 1050D Ballistic Nylon. To maximize functionality the fabrics appear in a gradient from heaviest at the bottom to lightest up top.

The Laptop Bag is designed to organize your work essentials with ease––whether you’re running around town or catching your next flight. This is a modern take on a commuter briefcase, featuring a padded interior laptop sleeve, multiple pockets for organization, detachable shoulder strap, and luggage handle pass-through.

  • VX21 XPAC, X50 XPAC, 500D Cordura / 275D Dyneema Ripstop, and 1050D Ballistic Nylon
  • Weather-resistant main compartment with zipper closure
  • Light grey 420D packcloth liner
  • Padded interior laptop sleeve fits up to 16″ MacBook Pro
  • Interior zip mesh pocket
  • Weather-resistant exterior flap pocket with key tether and internal pockets for organization
  • Weather-resistant exterior zip pocket
  • 9″ luggage handle pass-through
  • Tubular webbing carry handles
  • 54″ adjustable nylon padded shoulder strap with AustriAlpin 25mm COBRA buckle attachments
  • Water-resistant urethane coated YKK zippers
  • Dimensions: 15″ (38.1 cm) x 3″ (7.6 cm) x 11″ (27.9 cm) – (8L)
  • Handmade in California

See more at ILE.

The post ILE Blackout Patchwork Laptop Bag appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
